page_content:
Packaging
A Shipment Zero order will be shipped in its own container 
or in carbon neutral packaging. We continue to raise the 
bar for sustainable packaging—from optimizing the size 
and weight of shipping materials, inventing new recyclable 
mailers, and working with suppliers to streamline and 
innovate product packaging.
Transportation
A Shipment Zero package will be transported in a zero-emissions 
delivery vehicle—for example, one of our 100,000 newly ordered electric 
delivery vehicles, an electric bike, or an electric rickshaw in India. We also 
leverage innovative technology to maximize efficiency on the road and 
reduce delivery times by placing delivery stations close to large Amazon 
customer populations.
